stripped_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. Place up to 3 advancement counters on 1 unrezzed card in the root of a remote server. Gain 2 credits for each counter placed this way. You cannot access that card for the remainder of the turn.
text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
Place up to 3 advancement counters on 1 unrezzed card in the root of a remote server. Gain 2[credit] for each counter placed this way. You cannot access that card for the remainder of the turn.
title: Queen's Gambit
